body.name: AiTechny Digital Camera for Kids, 1080P FHD Camera, 44MP Point and Shoot Digital Camera for Pictures with 32GB Card, 16X Zoom, Compact Small Vintage Camera Gifts for Teens Kids Boys Girls(Pink)

Or fastest pickup Wednesday, February 14. Order within 56 mins
features: 【High-Resolution Imaging & Easy Operation】AiTechny Digital Camera is equipped with a high-resolution CMOS sensor and an IPS color screen. With the capability to capture 44MP photos and record in smooth 1080p video, your memories come to life. Designed for kids, teens, and beginners, this point-and-shoot digital camera requires no intricate setup. Ideal for nurturing kids' interest in photography and crafting delightful moments with family and friends.

【Practical & Fun】This digital camera for kids simplifies photography for your enjoyment. With a 16x digital zoom, you can capture every detail you desire. Fill light ensures your shots are well-lit and clear. Get creative with 20 unique filters and explore fun features like anti-shake and the self-timer. With a built-in microphone, it records crisp FHD 1080p video and doubles as a webcam. Whether you're recording daily moments, taking travel selfies, or vlogging, this camera has you covered.

【Rechargeable & Portable】 No need to remove the battery for charging; simply use the included USB-C charging cable to charge your compact digital camera anytime, anywhere. With its long-lasting, high-capacity battery, this small digital camera allows you to shoot all day without worrying about running out of power. Its pocket-sized, lightweight design ensures it's always ready to accompany you on your travels or daily adventures.

【Image Transfer & 32GB Card】Effortlessly transfer your images from the digital camera to your computer or smartphone. This cameras for pictures comes with a 32GB card, ensuring ample storage for preserving precious memories. Use the provided USB-C cable to swiftly download pictures and videos to your computer. Alternatively, you can utilize an card reader (not included) to transfer pictures and videos from the camera's card to your phone for convenient sharing on social media.

【Exceptional Service & Perfect Gift】Backed by 12 months hassle-free promise- refund and replacement. But that's not all – Beautifully packaged, this vintage digital camera is the ideal gift for those special moments! Whether it's your child's first kids camera or a thoughtful surprise for a best friend, it's an excellent choice. Ideal for gifting on holidays like Christmas and Thanksgiving, as well as for birthdays, graduations, and Valentine's Day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Digital Camera for Young Photographers Not for toddlers aged 2-3; we've crafted this 1080P digital camera for kids and teens aged 4-12. ✔️Photo & Video: High-resolution imaging, bringing memories to life ✔️Creative Photography: 20 filters, 16x Zoom, Self-timer, Timestamp and other fun features ✔️User-Friendly: No complex setup, easy to get started

Capture Memories Whether you're recording daily moments, or taking travel selfies, this camera has you covered. Video Recording - Zoom in and out as you wish during the recording - Pause, fast-forward, or rewind your videos during playback 2x-16x Digital Zoom Explore every detail with precision using the adjustable zoom.

Webcam To switch your camera to webcam mode, connect it to your computer and simultaneously press the power button and shutter button for one second. 20 Filters for Creative Unleash your creativity with a wide range of artistic filters. Pocket Size & Lightweight Ensure it's ready to be your travel or everyday companion, always.

How to transfer images to a computer and smartphone? Transfer to computer: The package includes a USB-C cable. Connect one end of the USB-C cable to the camera and the other end to an available USB port on your computer. Once connected, power on the camera. Your computer should recognize the camera as an external device, allowing you to access and transfer photos.If your computer doesn't have a USB-C port, you'll need to obtain either a suitable data cable(not included) that matches your computer's interface or an SD card reader(not included). This will allow you to either connect the camera directly to your computer or use the SD card reader to transfer photos from the camera's SD card to your computer. Transfer to smartphone: Please obtain the SD card reader(not included) that matches your smartphone. Use the SD card reader to transfer photos from the camera's SD card to your smartphone.

Warm Tips: 1. Please fully charge the battery and format the SD card before the first time you use this digital camera. (package includes a 32GB TF card) 2. Please set the video resolution to 1080p and image resolution to 44MP to get a better image quality. 3. SD card reader not included. Note: When you encounter any problems, click on the store to ask questions, and there will be staff to answer you quickly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and cute!
reviews.reviewText: I got this digital camera for my young daughter for Christmas. She loves the pink and it is simple to use and takes good resolution pictures and videos with auto or preset modes, and even has a 16x zoom. It comes with 32MB memory and the pictures and video can be taken off directly using the USB cable or taken off the card using a reader. Also included is a battery and a cable & charging block if you want to charge it using a wall socket, but it can also be charged from the computer/laptop. Best of all I don’t worry as much about her breaking it or losing it. Great way for her to capture memories with her friends and learning and experimenting with photography.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little camera
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice little fun camera. Picked this up for my niece since she’s been into taking pictures lately. It comes with a wall charger which I think is nice. Also has a lanyard, lens cleaner and an SD card. Pretty convenient. Picture and video quality is decent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for the price!
reviews.reviewText: The camera was perfect for my granddaughter. Takes great pictures! Easy to set up and use. Good battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our Tween!
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter wanted a camera so bad for a trip and this was perfect. It’s small and comes with a carrying case. She had no trouble working it and got lots of great pics!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Capturing beyond expectations
reviews.reviewText: The camera feels sturdy and well-built, making it comfortable to hold and use for extended periods. The 20-megapixel sensor delivers crisp and vibrant photos, capturing every detail with precision. One of the standout features for me was the impressive zoom capability. With built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, transferring photos to my smartphone for quick sharing or remote control was seamless. The accompanying mobile app is user-friendly and adds a layer of convenience to the overall experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent camera! Perfect for kid
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for my friend’s daughter. Easy to use, light weight. Durable as she already dropped it. Overall great pricing for what it does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, Simple Digital Camera
reviews.reviewText: We got this for my 4 year old for Christmas and he absolutely loves it! He wears it around his neck and goes all around the house taking pictures.I love the simplicity of this camera and my 4 year old has no trouble using it. The pictures are decent quality and about what I expected for the price.I love that it came with a memory card as well as decent internal memory.I specifically picked this camera over others geared towards kids because I wanted one that didn’t have video games on it.Overall very satisfied with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids digital camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera is awesome for what it offers! It is definitely meant for kids but I am in my 20s and love to take it with me when I go out with my friends! The pictures are great and the camera is so tiny and cute!
